NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Gaming Platforms and Growth or the cell corresponding to YouTube and Users?
NC.A: The cell corresponding to {YouTube} and {Users} has a higher heat value.

NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Instagram and Growth or the cell corresponding to Podcasts and Users?
NC.A: The cell corresponding to {Podcasts} and {Users} has a higher heat value.

NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Facebook and Growth or the cell corresponding to YouTube and Monetization?
NC.A: The cell corresponding to {YouTube} and {Monetization} has a higher heat value.

NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to YouTube and Algorithms or the cell corresponding to Online News and Growth?
NC.A: The cell corresponding to {Online News} and {Growth} has a higher heat value.
